posts.description: Call Me Crazy - The New Yorker
posts.extended: I hereby uninvent the conference call. That’s right, there is now no means by which six or twenty or—God forbid—a hundred people can all meet and discuss a topic over the phone.

posts.description: Jennings Brown on Twitter: "Slack poetry with @kellybourdet https://t.co/iRa1hxS5yY"
Behind the scenes: Recode design process | Vox Product Blog
posts.extended: We just re-launched Recode, our tech/business news and analysis brand. For our Brand Identity team, this marked a different type of redesign.
